body: This specific flag for this specific command is the only one in Spack containing underscores. Since every Unix command I know of uses [dashes](https://stackoverflow.com/q/1253679/5828163), I switched it to dashes for conformity. No changes are needed for the Bash completion script, as the script already thinks it is `--all-root`.
title: spack buildcache: --allow_root -> --allow-root
